mapper.select: SELECT p.id , p.name , p.description , p.create_date , p.modify_date , p.status , p.resource_img_id , p.category_id , c."name" as "catgory_name" , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = p.create_by) as "create_by" , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = p.modify_by) as "modify_by" FROM product p INNER JOIN category c on c.id = p.category_id where p.status != #{status}
